Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

Ethernet.description: The network function metrics for an Ethernet interface.
Ethernet.longDescription: This type shall describe the Ethernet related network function metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

NumOffloadedIPv4Conns.description: The total number of offloaded TCP/IPv4 connections.
NumOffloadedIPv4Conns.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of offloaded TCP/IPv4 connections.

NumOffloadedIPv6Conns.description: The total number of offloaded TCP/IPv6 connections.
NumOffloadedIPv6Conns.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of offloaded TCP/IPv6 connections.

FibreChannel.description: The network function metrics for a Fibre Channel interface.
FibreChannel.longDescription: This type shall describe the Fibre Channel related network function metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PortLoginAccepts.description: The total number of port login (PLOGI) accept (ACC) responses.
PortLoginAccepts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of PLOGI ACC responses received by this Fibre Channel function.

PortLoginRejects.description: The total number of port login (PLOGI) reject (RJT) responses.
PortLoginRejects.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of PLOGI RJT responses received by this Fibre Channel function.

PortLoginRequests.description: The total number of port login (PLOGI) requests transmitted.
PortLoginRequests.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of PLOGI requests sent by this function.

RXCongestionFPINs.description: The total number of Congestion Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) received.
RXCongestionFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Congestion FPINs received by this Fibre Channel function.

RXDeliveryFPINs.description: The total number of Delivery Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) received.
RXDeliveryFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Delivery FPINs received by this Fibre Channel function.

RXExchanges.description: The total number of Fibre Channel exchanges received.
RXExchanges.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel exchanges received.

RXLinkIntegrityFPINs.description: The total number of Link Integrity Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) received.
RXLinkIntegrityFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Link Integrity FPINs received by this Fibre Channel function.

RXPeerCongestionFPINs.description: The total number of Peer Congestion Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) received.
RXPeerCongestionFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Peer Congestion FPINs received by this Fibre Channel function.

RXSequences.description: The total number of Fibre Channel sequences received.
RXSequences.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel sequences received.

TXCongestionFPINs.description: The total number of Congestion Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) sent.
TXCongestionFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Congestion FPINs sent by this Fibre Channel function.

TXDeliveryFPINs.description: The total number of Delivery Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) sent.
TXDeliveryFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Delivery FPINs sent by this Fibre Channel function.

TXExchanges.description: The total number of Fibre Channel exchanges transmitted.
TXExchanges.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel exchanges transmitted.

TXLinkIntegrityFPINs.description: The total number of Link Integrity Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) sent.
TXLinkIntegrityFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Link Integrity FPINs sent by this Fibre Channel function.

TXPeerCongestionFPINs.description: The total number of Peer Congestion Fabric Performance Impact Notifications (FPINs) sent.
TXPeerCongestionFPINs.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Peer Congestion FPINs sent by this Fibre Channel function.

TXSequences.description: The total number of Fibre Channel sequences transmitted.
TXSequences.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of Fibre Channel sequences transmitted.

NetworkDeviceFunctionMetrics.description: The NetworkDeviceFunctionMetrics schema contains usage and health statistics for a network function of a network adapter.
NetworkDeviceFunctionMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the network metrics for a single network function of a network adapter in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Ethernet.description: The network function metrics specific to Ethernet adapters.
Ethernet.longDescription: This property shall contain network function metrics specific to Ethernet adapters.

FibreChannel.description: The network function metrics specific to Fibre Channel adapters.
FibreChannel.longDescription: This property shall contain network function metrics specific to Fibre Channel adapters.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RXAvgQueueDepthPercent.description: The average RX queue depth as the percentage.
RXAvgQueueDepthPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the average RX queue depth as the percentage.

RXBytes.description: The total number of bytes received on a network function.
RXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes received on a network function, inclusive of all protocol overhead.

RXFrames.description: The total number of frames received on a network function.
RXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames received on a network function.

RXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of good multicast frames received on a network function since reset.
RXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good multicast frames received on a network function since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

RXQueuesEmpty.description: Whether nothing is in a network function's RX queues to DMA.
RXQueuesEmpty.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether nothing is in a network function's RX queues to DMA.

RXQueuesFull.description: The number of RX queues that are full.
RXQueuesFull.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of RX queues that are full.

RXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of good unicast frames received on a network function since reset.
RXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good unicast frames received on a network function since reset.

TXAvgQueueDepthPercent.description: The average TX queue depth as the percentage.
TXAvgQueueDepthPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the average TX queue depth as the percentage.

TXBytes.description: The total number of bytes sent on a network function.
TXBytes.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of bytes sent on a network function, inclusive of all protocol overhead.

TXFrames.description: The total number of frames sent on a network function.
TXFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of frames sent on a network function.

TXMulticastFrames.description: The total number of good multicast frames transmitted on a network function since reset.
TXMulticastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good multicast frames transmitted on a network function since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

TXQueuesEmpty.description: Whether all TX queues for a network function are empty.
TXQueuesEmpty.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether all TX queues for a network function are empty.

TXQueuesFull.description: The number of TX queues that are full.
TXQueuesFull.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of TX queues that are full.

TXUnicastFrames.description: The total number of good unicast frames transmitted on a network function since reset.
TXUnicastFrames.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of good unicast frames transmitted on a network function since reset, including host and remote management passthrough traffic.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #NetworkDeviceFunctionMetrics.v1_1_0.NetworkDeviceFunctionMetrics
